attributes.title: Killzone Is Dead (And that's a Good Thing)
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about Killzone.com getting shutdown, Bloodborne month, and so much more!

attributes.title: Hitman 3 Review (So Far)
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing are joined by some Kinda Funny All-Stars to talk about #Hitman3 reviews and more!

attributes.title: PlayStation is an Xbox Publisher
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about MLB The Show coming to Xbox and what it means for PlayStation's future!

attributes.title: The Definitive Bloodborne Podcast
attributes.description: A hunter must hunt. Greg and Blessing are joined by Andy Cortez, GameSpot's Tamoor Hussain, and IGN's Brian Altano to talk everything #Bloodborne.

attributes.title: Our Most Anticipated 2021 Games
attributes.description: Blessing is joined by IGN BEYOND's Jonathan Dornbush to talk about the games they're most looking forward to in 2021.

attributes.title: God of War: Ragnarok Hopes, Dreams, Fears
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing tackle the big question: what if we don't play as Kratos in God of War: Ragnarok?

attributes.title: Is PlayStation Plus a True Xbox Game Pass Competitor?
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about whether or not PlayStation Plus is entering a new era, Greg reviews Maquette, and more!

attributes.title: PS5: How Will History Remember Year 1?
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about how much use their PS5s are getting as PS5s (it'll make sense when you listen), Concrete Genie, and how Blessing should get an iPhone.

attributes.title: Is PlayStation Afraid of Xbox Yet?
attributes.description: In the wake of Bethesda joining Xbox and Outriders coming to Game Pass, Greg and Blessing get into what all this means for PlayStation.

attributes.title: The Problematic Death of the PlayStation Store
attributes.description: Greg and Bless dive into the rumors that the PS3, Vita, and PSP PlayStation Stores are on their way out.

attributes.title: 15 Must Play PlayStation Vita Games
attributes.description: If the sun is finally setting on the PlayStation Vita, let's load up those memory cards for a trip to the great beyond. (BEYOND!)

attributes.title: Ratchet and Clank Review
attributes.description: Joey Noelle joins Blessing and Greg to talk about playing 2016 Ratchet and Clank to get ready for #RiftApart, the boys breakdown the BONKERS news that MLB The Show is coming to Xbox Game Pass, and more!

attributes.title: The Last of Us Doesn’t Need to Be Remade
attributes.description: Greg and Bless will play The Last of Us remake, but let's talk about other games that also deserve to be remade.

attributes.title: 10 Features The PlayStation 5 Still Needs
attributes.description: Janet Garcia joins Blessing to talk about features that we still want from the PlayStation 5!

attributes.title: Returnal Review
attributes.description: Blessing has beaten Returnal, Greg's played a bunch, and you have questions -- let's get into it! Plus, Parris! Game provided by PlayStation for review.

attributes.title: Is Returnal Too Difficult?
attributes.description: The conversation about Returnal's difficulty is grabbing a lot of headlines, so Greg and Bless are joined by Steve Saylor The Blind Gamer to talk about accessibility options and where we're at with difficulty options in 2021.

attributes.title: Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart Preview
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing have seen a whole bunch of Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart behind closed doors, so let's all gather 'round these microphones and talk it out.

attributes.title: Why Starfield Isn’t Coming to PS5
attributes.description: Greg, Bless, and special Guest Kyle Stephenson talk about Gamesbeat's report that Starfield isn't coming to PlayStation, why DualSense matters, and more!

attributes.title: PlayStation 5: Seven Years Later
attributes.description: We’re burying a PlayStation 5 Time Capsule! Join Greg and Blessing as they make this podcast packed with questions, dreams, and hopes for where PlayStation’s at on May 25, 2028!

attributes.title: Disco Elysium - The Final Cut Spoilercast
attributes.description: Blessing is joined by Easy Allies' Isla Hinck, IGN's Simon Cardy, and Gamespot's Lucy James for a spoiler filled discussion about Disco Elysium.

attributes.title: Your Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart Questions Answered
attributes.description: Blessing is joined by Steve Saylor and Tim Gettys to dive deep into Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart and answer all of your questions.

attributes.title: PlayStation’s E3 2021 Conference (What It Should’ve Been)
attributes.description: Blessing is joined by Janet Garcia to talk about what E3 means for PlayStation and build our own E3 2021 press conferences with our own reveals, surprises, updates, and more!

attributes.title: What Makes a Great PlayStation Spin-Off?
attributes.description: Greg, Blessing, and Janet Garcia go through Blessing's EXTENSIVE video game release calendar and also talk about what makes a great video game spin-off.

attributes.title: PlayStation Strikes Back
attributes.description: After months of letting Xbox have the industry headlines, PlayStation's on a studio buying spree and a roll with Director's Cuts. What's it all mean? Greg, Bless, and Janet dive in! Plus, a Chicory review and talk about PlayStation indies.

attributes.title: Kojima Doesn’t Like ‘Director’s Cut,’ Do You?
attributes.description: Death Stranding Director's Cut Director Hideo Kojima doesn't dig the Director's Cut label, but what about you? Greg and Janet talk about PlayStation's new label AND get into The Last of Us HBO show, a Where the Heart Leads review, and more!

attributes.title: Greg Miller Apologizes for What He Did
attributes.description: For the first time in his career, Greg Miller apologizes to a video game developer. Plus, Janet's got thoughts on Supermassive Games, The Last of Us HBO show is looking good, and Barrett's played Psychonauts 2!

attributes.title: Is Uncharted Overrated?
attributes.description: Last week, Janet Garcia introduced the idea that Uncharted might be overrated. For one week, you’ve had A LOT to say about that, so today, Greg, Blessing, and Janet tackle the topic and the HUNDREDS of responses you sent in!

attributes.title: Nothing Can Stop the PS5’s Popularity
attributes.description: Greg and Blessing talk about why the PS5 can't be stopped, why The Forgotten City is a must-play, and Avengers quadruple XP weekend.

attributes.title: The Best Stuff We're Playing on PlayStation
attributes.description: Greg, Blessing, and Janet come together to talk about PSVR2, Ghost of Tsushima's future, and the best games they're playing!

attributes.title: PlayStation Game of The Year So Far
attributes.description: Blessing, Greg, and Janet talk do a "Game of The Year Watch" and talk about this year's best titles from Ratchet and Clank and It Takes Two to Returnal and Chicory.

attributes.title: Deathloop, Jett: The Far Shore Previews
attributes.description: Greg, Blessing, and Janet dig into their time with two of the PS5's hottest upcoming games -- Deathloop and Jett: The Far Shore!

attributes.title: Far Cry 6 Preview
attributes.description: Greg and Janet have played a bunch of Far Cry 6, and now, Blessing gets to hear all about it!

attributes.title: PlayStation Showcase 2021: The Predictions Episode
attributes.description: IT'S HAPPENING. PlayStation Showcase 2021 is here and it's time for us to predict everything that may or may not show up, from Horizon Forbidden West to God of War Ragnarok.

attributes.title: PlayStation Showcase’s Unanswered Questions
attributes.description: It's a BANGER of a show; Andy joins us to preview Solar Ash, everyone argues about how big The Last of Us Factions 2 will be, and we predict the Wolverine game!

attributes.title: Kena: Bridge of Spirits Review
attributes.description: We've beaten Kena: Bridge of Spirits, and we're ready to tell you all about it. Plus, what should God of War tackle next?

attributes.title: Life Is Strange: True Colors Spoilercast
attributes.description: Greg, Janet, and Barrett give you all the PlayStation news for the week and delve DEEP into their experience with Life Is Strange: True Colors.

attributes.title: Best PlayStation Studio 2021 (And 2022)
attributes.description: Greg, Blessing, and Janet talk about all the PlayStation Studios news, Alan Wake, Life Is Strange DLC, and more!

attributes.title: PlayStation Games That Deserve a Remake
attributes.description: Greg is gone being a father! So the kids come out to play. Let's talk about the PlayStation games that deserve a remake, PlayStation game sales, and more!

attributes.title: PlayStation 5’s First Year: The Good & The Bad
attributes.description:
Video Disclaimer: Our computer broke down in the middle of recording this episode so the video quality is a little lower than usual. We're sorry and we hope you understand!

Blessing and Janet do a special Reader Mail episode! Let's talk about how many PlayStation Studios new IPs we'll see this generation, how PS5 has done in its first year, and more!

attributes.title: State of Play: Predictions, Hopes, and Dreams
attributes.description: There's a new State of Play coming this week, but are we hyped for it? Blessing and Janet talk about our expectations, predictions and hopes for State of Play along with news about Horizon Forbidden West, God of War coming to PC, Guardians of the Galaxy impressions, and more!

attributes.title: Is PlayStation State of Play Good Enough?
attributes.description: Let's talk about that latest State of Play. Blessing and Janet tackle all of your thoughts, along with PlayStation PC, Dark Pictures: House of Ashes thoughts, and more!

attributes.title: Our Definitive 2021 PlayStation Holiday Shopping Guide
attributes.description: What are some games and accessories you need to pick up this holiday season? Blessing and Janet have you covered. Let's talk all about the Black Friday and Christmas purchases that are essential.

attributes.title: GTA Trilogy: Is The Definitive Edition Good or Bad?
attributes.description: It's time for a review, a Grand Theft Auto: The Trilogy - Definitive Edition Review! Blessing Janet, and Barrett have been playing all weekend and are ready to dive in to all of the good and bad of this remaster/remake/port of GTA III, GTA Vice City, and GTA San Andreas.

attributes.title: Deciding PlayStation's Best Character
attributes.description: Which PlayStation character is the best? The greatest? The most iconic!? Blessing and Janet get to the bottom of it in this special Bracket episode.

attributes.title: PlayStation Now 2021 Review
attributes.description: Is PlayStation Now worth having? Does it compare to Game Pass? Does it need to? Blessing and Janet discuss it all in this 2021 review of PS Now.

attributes.title: Does PlayStation FINALLY Have An Answer to Xbox Game Pass?
attributes.description: Project Spartacus has been reported as PlayStation's subscription service to compete with Game Pass. But will it be able to match up? Blessing and Janet discuss that, PS Plus, Horizon Forbidden West, and more.

attributes.title: The 2021 PS I Love You XOXO PlayStation Awards
attributes.description: Greg returns to join Blessing and Janet for our 100th episode. Let's end the year by arguing about our favorite games!

attributes.title: PlayStation 2022 Predictions
attributes.description: Greg's back, so Blessing, Janet, and him get to predicting what PlayStation is going to do this year!
